snippet: Nine Shiite pilgrims from Lebanon kidnapped in Syria more than a year ago were freed on Friday as part of a negotiated hostage release.
abstract: Nine Shiite pilgrims from Lebanon kidnapped in Syria in May 2012 are freed as part of a negotiated hostage release that could lead to the release of two Turkish pilots held in Lebanon.
lead_paragraph: Nine Shiite pilgrims from Lebanon kidnapped in Syria more than a year ago were freed on Friday as part of a negotiated hostage release.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
